response_requirements.initial_response_description: Record must be produced for inspection within 3 business days of receipt, or certification made that record is exempt within 3 business days
response_requirements.final_response_notes: Must produce or certify exemption within 3 business days
response_requirements.extension_notes: No formal extension mechanism in statute
response_requirements.good_faith_standard: Must allow examination at reasonable times

fee_structure.search_fee: May charge if request exceeds 30 minutes
fee_structure.search_fee_notes: Staff time charges allowed if request exceeds 30 minutes; charges must be reasonable and actual costs only
fee_structure.copy_fee_notes: Agencies may charge actual copying costs and mailing/transmission costs
fee_structure.reasonableness_standard: All charges must be reasonable and actual costs only

exemptions.description: Records which may only be disclosed to specifically designated persons
Records the disclosure of which would cause violation of professional ethics standards
Records the disclosure of which would cause violation of statutory or common law privileges
Information that would constitute unreasonable invasion of privacy

appeal_process.first_level_notes: No administrative appeals process - direct court review. Any person denied access may apply to superior court.
appeal_process.attorney_fees_notes: Court costs and attorney's fees may be awarded; damages available for willful and knowing violations
appeal_process.criminal_penalties_notes: Criminal penalties for willful and knowing violations

requester_requirements.purpose_notes: No specific format required; must adequately identify desired records; may be oral or written (written preferred)
requester_requirements.request_format_notes: Any person may inspect public records; no specific form required
requester_requirements.specific_format: May be oral or written (written preferred)
requester_requirements.constitutional_right: Vermont Constitution Chapter I, Article 6 provides fundamental right of access

agency_obligations.business_hours_notes: State agencies: 9 AM-12 PM and 1 PM-4 PM except weekends/holidays. Political subdivisions: customary business hours.
agency_obligations.response_format_options: Standard formats: photocopies or electronic format
agency_obligations.redaction_requirements: Must justify denials with specific exemption citations
agency_obligations.liberal_interpretation: Provisions shall be liberally construed to implement policy of access; exemptions construed narrowly

validation_metadata.verification_notes: All fields verified from official Vermont statutes. Response time: 3 business days to produce or certify exemption. Strong presumption of access - 'people's right to know is key to all their liberties'. No administrative appeals - direct superior court review. Burden of proof on public agency to sustain denial. Liberal construction in favor of access, narrow construction of exemptions. Staff time charges only if request exceeds 30 minutes.
unique_characteristics: No administrative appeals - direct court review
Burden on agency to justify denial
Staff time charges only if exceeds 30 minutes
